parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Arrays

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Compares types of all elements of an array to the type of a single value.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> arr '''isEqualTypeAll''' val

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> arr: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> val: [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0];
_arr [[isEqualTypeAll]] ""; //false
_arr [[isEqualTypeAll]] 0; //true</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isEqualTypeArray]], [[isEqualTypeAny]], [[isEqualType]], [[isEqualTypeParams]], [[param]], [[params]], [[isEqualTo]], [[typeName]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 25, 2015 - 17:55 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command will return false if the array on the left side is empty ([]) regardless of the sample value.<br>
<code>[] isEqualTypeAll ""
-> false
</code><br>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
